items.text: full on middle, and he clips this off his toes to short fine leg. DK wants the single, but Dhoni sends him back
full on middle and swept once again. But nicely intercepted by Rubel at short fine leg once more
full just outside off, and he mistimes the cover drive straight back to the bowler. Rubel sticks his right hand ou and stops the ball from going past him
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full just outside off. Dhoni walks across to the off side, and taps this back towards mid off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and angling down leg. Dhoni works this off his pads to fine leg for a single

items.preText: Darshan Mandali: "50 partnership in 76 balls isn't slow at all with context of this game. Infact it steadied India's ship. "
items.text: full on off stump, and DK prefers to defend with the full face of the bat. The ball rolls back to Rubel
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, no run

items.text: good length on off, but tailing into DK. Too close to his body for the cut shot, and he carves this to point from near his body
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, no run

items.text: short! Attacking the batsman's body with a short ball on off stump. DK does well to get away from the line of the ball
items.postText: Change in commentary here. Will that bring a change in Bangladesh's fortunes? Find out with Varun.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked to square leg
attempts a legcutter, it slides down leg side
length on off stump, steps out and flicks to midwicket
front-of-the-hand slider on middle stump. Makes room and jabs it to extra cover

he's missed a full toss! Bang in front of middle stump. Mahmudullah has broken the partnership inadvertently. Nothing extraordinary about this ball other than the fact that the batsman has missed it. He was looking to flick from middle stump and just...couldn't.
items.postText:
Nitesh: "Why DK why? As expected gifted his wicket out after all the hard work!!! So frustrating if you like his batting."

Naseef: "Varun you lucky charm!! Stay till the end mate!! "

ray r: "Commentator's Curse, Varun go back!!"

mey: "Under 90 needed in 20 can I sleep without much worry? " --- Sit down.

dismissal.text: KD Karthik lbw b Mahmudullah 37 (61b 1x4 1x6) SR: 60.65

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, punched back down the pitch
dropped short at middle stump. Pulled to deep midwicket's right
items.postText: Hardeep Singh: "Varun............ You are a partnership breaker" --- Let's hope so, I have a game in eight hours.

items.text: bouncer in the corridor, left alone
items.postText: Lalu: "Best chance for KJ to show his value as a batsman in this indian line up. No doubt about his valuable bowling though "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full and just outside off, stabbed off the front foot to extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length ball hooping in at off stump, jabbed into the off side on the up
items.postText: Yogesh Sawant: "These are all the little opportunities for which Karthik will curse himself for not encashing! He should understand his value playing as a batsmen.. he is not adding any value as a keeper.. price your wicket mate! "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full inswinger at off stump. Solid as he punches this to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, pushed to extra cover's left
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: short ball in at off stump. Looks to tickle it square but he hits it straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
beauty. Jadhav doesn't rate spinners. Just does not. Jumps down the track - no more blocking - and meets it at the pitch before launching it straight over the bowler with a neat swing from under it
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length quicker one at leg stump, chips it out to deep midwicket's right with a pull
